text: 9.17: Kis 9.16; Ga 3.8; 3.22Fhe Bakɨmen buni vhuuiŋ ki gavar Fhe Bakɨme khaŋ Idzɨviŋ ŋgui vhɨrve gari guman pana suaŋgi, “Gu ndu ndi fagim, ndu ŋgui vhɨrve gari guman pan ki. Gu won ŋkasŋka bakɨmen, gu ŋkasŋka ki bigir muuŋv simtɨgar ndun nɨɨŋv, won ŋkasŋka bakɨme ndi khɨvɨrga. Gu nera nzuav ndu ndi fagi. Kha gumgi gu mbigi, mbe za na zɨ bakɨme bun za kha nuianan ki gumgi gu mbigi ga suanga.”
